data.prayer: Spirit, help the 234 believers find a person of peace today among the 209,766 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tashauz, Turkmenistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Tashauz against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Tashauz, Turkmenistan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 210,000 people living in Tashauz, Turkmenistan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Lezgin people. Make the Lezgin people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, cause the 234 believers in Tashauz to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 234 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tashauz. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Tashauz
location.people_groups_list: Lak, Baloch, Western, Kazakh, Pashtun, Northern, Avar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lak (4,500), Baloch, Western (50,000), Kazakh (29,000), Pashtun, Northern (10,000), Avar (900)
